types.name: Query
types.description: The query root of this schema. See available queries.

fields.name: root
fields.description: Root object to get viewer related collections

types.name: ID
types.description: Represents a unique identifier that is Base64 obfuscated. It is often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"VXNlci0xMA=="`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: Viewer
types.description: Support unassociated root queries that fetches collections.

fields.name: current_user
fields.description: Returns current signed in user object

fields.name: posts
fields.description: Post connection to fetch paginated posts collection.

args.name: first
args.description: Returns the first _n_ elements from the list.

args.name: after
args.description: Returns the elements in the list that come after the specified global ID.

args.name: last
args.description: Returns the last _n_ elements from the list.

args.name: before
args.description: Returns the elements in the list that come before the specified global ID.

fields.name: tags
fields.description: List of tags for all posts

types.name: String
types.description: Represents textual data as UTF-8 character sequences. This type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

fields.description: created_at field for the User model

types.name: Int
types.description: Represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.
